title: T200 New York Giants NL PSA 2

posts.post_title: T200 New York Giants NL PSA 2
posts.post_content:
Nice looking card with Jim Thorpe, Christy Mathewson, John McGraw and Grover Hartley - PSA 2.  Great contrast!  Price is $1050 dlvd.  Please email [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url] with any questions.  Thank you.

John
